verses.verse: בִּשְׁנַ֣ת <S%H8141><s%> year שָׁל֔וֹשׁ <S%H7969><s%> In the third לְמַלְכ֖וּת <S%H4438><s%> of the reign יְהוֹיָקִ֣ים <S%H3079><s%> of Jehoiakim מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> came נְבוּכַדְנֶאצַּ֧ר <S%H5019><s%> Nebuchadnezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king בָּבֶ֛ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> unto Jerusalem וַיָּ֥צַר <S%H6696><s%> and besieged עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

וַיִּתֵּן֩ <S%H5414><s%> gave אֲדֹנָ֨י <S%H136><s%> And the Lord בְּיָד֜וֹ <S%H3027><s%> into his hand אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוֹיָקִ֣ים <S%H3079><s%> Jehoiakim מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וּמִקְצָת֙ <S%H7117><s%> with part כְּלֵ֣י <S%H3627><s%> of the vessels בֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God וַיְבִיאֵ֥ם <S%H935><s%> which he carried אֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> into the land שִׁנְעָ֖ר <S%H8152><s%> of Shinar בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> to the house אֱלֹהָ֑יו <S%H430><s%> of his god וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכֵּלִ֣ים <S%H3627><s%> the vessels הֵבִ֔יא <S%H935><s%> and he brought בֵּ֖ית <S%H1004><s%> house אוֹצַ֥ר <S%H214><s%> into the treasure אֱלֹהָֽיו׃ <S%H430><s%> of his god

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> spake הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king לְאַשְׁפְּנַ֖ז <S%H828><s%> unto Ashpenaz רַ֣ב <S%H7227><s%> the master סָרִיסָ֑יו <S%H5631><s%> of his eunuchs לְהָבִ֞יא <S%H935><s%> that he should bring מִבְּנֵ֧י <S%H1121><s%> [certain] of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וּמִזֶּ֥רַע <S%H2233><s%> seed הַמְּלוּכָ֖ה <S%H4410><s%> and of the king's וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> some הַֽפַּרְתְּמִֽים׃ <S%H6579><s%> and of the princes

יְלָדִ֣ים <S%H3206><s%> Children אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whom אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> else בָּהֶ֣ם כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every [מְאוּם כ] (מוּם֩ <S%H3971><s%> blemish ק) וְטוֹבֵ֨י <S%H2896><s%> but well מַרְאֶ֜ה <S%H4758><s%> favoured וּמַשְׂכִּילִ֣ים <S%H7919><s%> and skilful בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every חָכְמָ֗ה <S%H2451><s%> in all wisdom וְיֹ֤דְעֵי <S%H3045><s%> and cunning דַ֙עַת֙ <S%H1847><s%> in knowledge וּמְבִינֵ֣י <S%H995><s%> and understanding מַדָּ֔ע <S%H4093><s%> science וַאֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> and who כֹּ֣חַ <S%H3581><s%> and such as [had] ability בָּהֶ֔ם לַעֲמֹ֖ד <S%H5975><s%> in them to stand בְּהֵיכַ֣ל <S%H1964><s%> palace הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> in the king's וּֽלֲלַמְּדָ֥ם <S%H3925><s%> and whom they might teach סֵ֖פֶר <S%H5612><s%> the learning וּלְשׁ֥וֹן <S%H3956><s%> and the tongue כַּשְׂדִּֽים׃ <S%H3778><s%> of the Chaldeans

וַיְמַן֩ <S%H4487><s%> appointed לָהֶ֨ם הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> provision י֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> A daily בְּיוֹמ֗וֹ <S%H3117><s%> A daily מִפַּת־ בַּ֤ג <S%H6598><s%> meat הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> of the king's וּמִיֵּ֣ין <S%H3196><s%> and of the wine מִשְׁתָּ֔יו <S%H4960><s%> which he drank וּֽלְגַדְּלָ֖ם <S%H1431><s%> so nourishing שָׁנִ֣ים <S%H8141><s%> years שָׁל֑וֹשׁ <S%H7969><s%> them three וּמִ֨קְצָתָ֔ם <S%H7117><s%> that at the end יַֽעַמְד֖וּ <S%H5975><s%> thereof they might stand לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> the king

וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> become בָהֶ֖ם מִבְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> Now among these were of the children יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah דָּנִיֵּ֣אל <S%H1840><s%> Daniel חֲנַנְיָ֔ה <S%H2608><s%> Hananiah מִֽישָׁאֵ֖ל <S%H4332><s%> Mishael וַעֲזַרְיָֽה׃ <S%H5838><s%> and Azariah

וַיָּ֧שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> gave לָהֶ֛ם <S%H1992><s%> Then שַׂ֥ר <S%H8269><s%> Unto whom the prince הַסָּרִיסִ֖ים <S%H5631><s%> of the eunuchs שֵׁמ֑וֹת <S%H8034><s%> names וַיָּ֨שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> for he gave לְדָֽנִיֵּ֜אל <S%H1840><s%> unto Daniel בֵּ֣לְטְשַׁאצַּ֗ר <S%H1095><s%> [the name] of Belteshazzar וְלַֽחֲנַנְיָה֙ <S%H2608><s%> and to Hananiah שַׁדְרַ֔ךְ <S%H7714><s%> of Shadrach וּלְמִֽישָׁאֵ֣ל <S%H4332><s%> and to Mishael מֵישַׁ֔ךְ <S%H4335><s%> of Meshach וְלַעֲזַרְיָ֖ה <S%H5838><s%> and to Azariah עֲבֵ֥ד נְגֽוֹ׃ <S%H5664><s%> of Abednego

וַיָּ֤שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> purposed דָּנִיֵּאל֙ <S%H1840><s%> But Daniel עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in לִבּ֔וֹ <S%H3820><s%> in his heart אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> after לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יִתְגָּאַ֛ל <S%H1351><s%> that he would not defile בְּפַתְבַּ֥ג <S%H6598><s%> meat הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king's וּבְיֵ֣ין <S%H3196><s%> nor with the wine מִשְׁתָּ֑יו <S%H4960><s%> which he drank וַיְבַקֵּשׁ֙ <S%H1245><s%> therefore he requested מִשַּׂ֣ר <S%H8269><s%> of the prince הַסָּרִיסִ֔ים <S%H5631><s%> of the eunuchs אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> after לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יִתְגָּאָֽל׃ <S%H1351><s%> that he might not defile

וַיִּתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> had brought הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> Now God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דָּ֣נִיֵּ֔אל <S%H1840><s%> Daniel לְחֶ֖סֶד <S%H2617><s%> into favour וּֽלְרַחֲמִ֑ים <S%H7356><s%> and tender love לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> with שַׂ֥ר <S%H8269><s%> the prince הַסָּרִיסִֽים׃ <S%H5631><s%> of the eunuchs

וַיֹּ֜אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שַׂ֤ר <S%H8269><s%> And the prince הַסָּרִיסִים֙ <S%H5631><s%> of the eunuchs לְדָ֣נִיֵּ֔אל <S%H1840><s%> unto Daniel יָרֵ֤א <S%H3373><s%> I fear אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲדֹנִ֣י <S%H113><s%> my lord הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who מִנָּ֔ה <S%H4487><s%> who hath appointed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַאֲכַלְכֶ֖ם <S%H3978><s%> your meat וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִשְׁתֵּיכֶ֑ם <S%H4960><s%> and your drink אֲשֶׁ֡ר <S%H834><s%> who לָמָּה֩ <S%H4100><s%> why יִרְאֶ֨ה <S%H7200><s%> for why should he see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פְּנֵיכֶ֜ם <S%H6440><s%> your faces זֹֽעֲפִ֗ים <S%H2196><s%> worse liking מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> more הַיְלָדִים֙ <S%H3206><s%> than the children אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who כְּגִֽילְכֶ֔ם <S%H1524><s%> exceedingly וְחִיַּבְתֶּ֥ם <S%H2325><s%> endanger אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֹאשִׁ֖י <S%H7218><s%> my head לַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> to the king

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said דָּנִיֵּ֖אל <S%H1840><s%> Daniel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּלְצַ֑ר <S%H4453><s%> to Melzar אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> whom מִנָּה֙ <S%H4487><s%> had set שַׂ֣ר <S%H8269><s%> whom the prince הַסָּֽרִיסִ֔ים <S%H5631><s%> of the eunuchs עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over דָּנִיֵּ֣אל <S%H1840><s%> over Daniel חֲנַנְיָ֔ה <S%H2608><s%> Hananiah מִֽישָׁאֵ֖ל <S%H4332><s%> Mishael וַעֲזַרְיָֽה׃ <S%H5838><s%> and Azariah

נַס־ <S%H5254><s%> Prove נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> Please אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲבָדֶ֖יךָ <S%H5650><s%> thy servants יָמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> days עֲשָׂרָ֑ה <S%H6235><s%> I beseech thee ten וְיִתְּנוּ־ <S%H5414><s%> and let them give לָ֜נוּ מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> some הַזֵּרֹעִ֛ים <S%H2235><s%> us pulse וְנֹאכְלָ֖ה <S%H398><s%> to eat וּמַ֥יִם <S%H4325><s%> and water וְנִשְׁתֶּֽה׃ <S%H8354><s%> to drink

וְיֵרָא֤וּ <S%H7200><s%> be looked upon לְפָנֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H6440><s%> before מַרְאֵ֔ינוּ <S%H4758><s%> Then let our countenances וּמַרְאֵה֙ <S%H4758><s%> thee and the countenance הַיְלָדִ֔ים <S%H3206><s%> of the children הָאֹ֣כְלִ֔ים <S%H398><s%> that eat אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> פַּתְבַּ֣ג <S%H6598><s%> meat הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king's וְכַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who תִּרְאֵ֔ה <S%H7200><s%> and as thou seest עֲשֵׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> deal עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with עֲבָדֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H5650><s%> with thy servants

וַיִּשְׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> So he consented לָהֶ֖ם לַדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> to them in this matter הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this וַיְנַסֵּ֖ם <S%H5254><s%> and proved יָמִ֥ים <S%H3117><s%> days עֲשָׂרָֽה׃ <S%H6235><s%> them ten

וּמִקְצָת֙ <S%H7117><s%> And at the end יָמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> days עֲשָׂרָ֔ה <S%H6235><s%> of ten נִרְאָ֤ה <S%H7200><s%> appeared מַרְאֵיהֶם֙ <S%H4758><s%> their countenances ט֔וֹב <S%H2896><s%> fairer וּבְרִיאֵ֖י <S%H1277><s%> and fatter בָּשָׂ֑ר <S%H1320><s%> in flesh מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> than כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַיְלָדִ֔ים <S%H3206><s%> than all the children הָאֹ֣כְלִ֔ים <S%H398><s%> which did eat אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> פַּתְבַּ֥ג <S%H6598><s%> meat הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> of the king's

וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> continued הַמֶּלְצַ֗ר <S%H4453><s%> Thus Melzar נֹשֵׂא֙ <S%H5375><s%> took away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פַּתְבָּגָ֔ם <S%H6598><s%> the portion of their meat וְיֵ֖ין <S%H3196><s%> and the wine מִשְׁתֵּיהֶ֑ם <S%H4960><s%> that they should drink וְנֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> and gave לָהֶ֖ם זֵרְעֹנִֽים׃ <S%H2235><s%> them pulse

וְהַיְלָדִ֤ים <S%H3206><s%> children הָאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> these אַרְבַּעְתָּ֔ם <S%H702><s%> As for these four נָתַ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> gave לָהֶ֧ם הָֽאֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> God מַדָּ֥ע <S%H4093><s%> them knowledge וְהַשְׂכֵּ֖ל <S%H7919><s%> and skill בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every סֵ֣פֶר <S%H5612><s%> in all learning וְחָכְמָ֑ה <S%H2451><s%> and wisdom וְדָנִיֵּ֣אל <S%H1840><s%> and Daniel הֵבִ֔ין <S%H995><s%> had understanding בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all חָז֖וֹן <S%H2377><s%> in all visions וַחֲלֹמֽוֹת׃ <S%H2472><s%> and dreams

וּלְמִקְצָת֙ <S%H7117><s%> Now at the end הַיָּמִ֔ים <S%H3117><s%> of the days אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> had said הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> that the king לַהֲבִיאָ֑ם <S%H935><s%> he should bring וַיְבִיאֵם֙ <S%H935><s%> brought שַׂ֣ר <S%H8269><s%> them in then the prince הַסָּרִיסִ֔ים <S%H5631><s%> of the eunuchs לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> them in before נְבֻכַדְנֶצַּֽר׃ <S%H5019><s%> Nebuchadnezzar

וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> communed אִתָּם֮ <S%H854><s%> for הַמֶּלֶךְ֒ <S%H4428><s%> And the king וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not נִמְצָא֙ <S%H4672><s%> with them and among them all was found מִכֻּלָּ֔ם <S%H3605><s%> all כְּדָנִיֵּ֣אל <S%H1840><s%> none like Daniel חֲנַנְיָ֔ה <S%H2608><s%> Hananiah מִֽישָׁאֵ֖ל <S%H4332><s%> Mishael וַעֲזַרְיָ֑ה <S%H5838><s%> and Azariah וַיַּֽעַמְד֖וּ <S%H5975><s%> therefore stood לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> they before הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> the king

וְכֹ֗ל <S%H3605><s%> every דְּבַר֙ <S%H1697><s%> And in all matters חָכְמַ֣ת <S%H2451><s%> of wisdom בִּינָ֔ה <S%H998><s%> [and] understanding אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which בִּקֵּ֥שׁ <S%H1245><s%> enquired מֵהֶ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> like הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> that the king וַֽיִּמְצָאֵ֞ם <S%H4672><s%> of them he found עֶ֣שֶׂר <S%H6235><s%> them ten times יָד֗וֹת <S%H3027><s%> better עַ֤ל <S%H5921><s%> better כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַֽחַרְטֻמִּים֙ <S%H2748><s%> than all the magicians הָֽאַשָּׁפִ֔ים <S%H825><s%> [and] astrologers אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> who בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מַלְכוּתֽוֹ׃ <S%H4438><s%> that [were] in all his realm

וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> continued דָּֽנִיֵּ֔אל <S%H1840><s%> And Daniel עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until שְׁנַ֥ת <S%H8141><s%> year אַחַ֖ת <S%H259><s%> continued [even] unto the first לְכ֥וֹרֶשׁ <S%H3566><s%> Cyrus הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> of king פ
